::Slayer::

Slayer's face broke into an evil smile as he continues to fly toward 
the Alliance base. From what he had read from the Trainers' computer, 
the Alliance seemed to be the strongest faction on the planet. Since 
the Trainers had attacked it, he knew what the base was capable of. 
The bots trailing him probably didn't.

"Let's play follow the leader..." he says to himself, speeding up.

> They stubborly continued following Slayer
